name: pnp-delete-non-group-connected-modern-sites
title: Delete all (non-group connected) modern SharePoint sites
shortDescription: The script handles the remaining modern sites: communication sites and groupless team sites.
longDescription: When you delete Microsoft 365 groups, the modern group-connected team sites get deleted with them. The script handles the remaining modern sites: communication sites and groupless team sites.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
